text: “Kose kwamuri, rufu rwunokuwanai kunyangwe mukave mudzimba kana midhuri mirefu yakasimba!” Uye kana chakanaka chikavasvikira vanoti: “Izvi zvabva kuna Allah,” asi zvakashata zvikavawira vanoti: “Izvi zvabva kunewe (Muhammad (SAW)).” Iti: “Zvinhu zvose zvinobva kuna Allah,” saka dambudziko revanhu ava nderei rekuti vanotadza kunzwisisa shoko rimwe chete
